description.p: You can use a bonus action to speak this magic sword's command word, causing flames or lightning to erupt from the blade. The flames shed bright light in a 40-foot radius and dim light for an additional 40 feet. While the sword is ablaze, it deals an extra 2d6 fire damage to any target it hits. The lightning can be used to shoot a bolt at 1 target as a ranged spell attack with a +6 to hit. The lightning does 3d6 lightning damage on a hit and causes the target to be paralyzed. The elemental effect lasts until you use a bonus action to speak the command word again or until you drop or sheathe the sword.
